param.name: model
param.label: Model type to train
param.help: Model type used for training. Must be one of the models supported by Caret package. Default: svmRadial

param.name: resample_method
param.label: Resample Method
param.help: Resampling method used for model fit evaluation

param.name: tune_length
param.label: Tune Length
param.help: An integer denoting the amount of granularity in the tuning parameter grid

param.name: metric
param.label: Performance Metric
param.help: Performance metric to be used to select best model

param.name: preprocess
param.label: Pre-processing Method
param.help: A string vector that defines a pre-processing of the predictor data. Enter values as comma-separated string. Current possibilities are 'BoxCox', 'YeoJohnson', 'expoTrans', 'center', 'scale', 'range', 'knnImpute', 'bagImpute', 'medianImpute', 'pca', 'ica' and 'spatialSign'. The default is 'center' and 'scale'.

param.name: return_data
param.label: Return Data
param.help: If TRUE, training data is returned within scPred object. Default: False

param.name: save_predictions
param.label: Save Predictions
param.help: Specifies the set of hold-out predictions for each resample that should be returned. Values can be either 'all', 'final' or 'none'.

param.name: reclassify
param.label: Cells to Reclassify
param.help: Cell types to reclassify using a different model
